pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of the DetMCD Algorithm (Robust and Deterministic Estimation of Location and Scatter) // Implementation of DetMCD, a new algorithm for robust and deterministic estimation of location and scatter. The benefits of robust and deterministic estimation are explained in Hubert, Rousseeuw and Verdonck (2012) doi:10.1080/10618600.2012.672100.
